main event: Witnesses observed large bright, pulsating red lights in the sky over Bellingham, Massachusetts on the night of November 5, 1965.
interesting points: The lights were seen by the witness, his wife, and two friends who testified the objects hovered and moved at tremendous speeds,The objects were described as being about 50 to 75 feet in diameter,The witness attempted to film the events with his camera, but nothing was captured on the film,This sighting follows prior singular sightings of similar pulsating objects over the months,A newspaper article mentioned a related incident involving two young boys frightened by a strange object during a power failure.
witness description: mechanical engineer and his wife along with two visiting friends
